title: Mishio
typeOfFood: Chinese, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. First-floor restaurant in the middle of the town near Käfigturm, overlooking Bundesplatz. Casual dining with open-view kitchen, chefs are Asian. Has a separate menu section listing 7 or so vegetable-based dishes like Szechuan seitan, udon miso soup, and chop suey. Portions are on the small side, so you might order a couple different ones. Has other outlets.
